sentences.english: Deep violet-red wine, with ripe berry and spicy aromas.
sentences.chinese: 此酒呈深紫紅色，散發出成熟漿果和香料的芳香。

sentences.english: Common low European shrub with purple-red flowers.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲普通的矮灌木，有紫紅色的花。

sentences.english: There is a maroon sofa right inside the door. The front windows are lined with living plants.
sentences.chinese: 門內有紫紅色的沙發吧，前窗襯活的植物。

sentences.english: Our Syrah has an intense red-purple color with.
sentences.chinese: 此款西拉酒體呈深紫紅色。

sentences.english: This wine has a purplish-red color with bluish tints.
sentences.chinese: 此酒呈紫紅色並泛有藍色的光澤。

sentences.english: The ruins of the "rose-red city" were discovered in 1812.
sentences.chinese: 這座“紫紅色的城市”的廢墟於1812年被發現。

sentences.english: He also offers less expected colors, like forest green and aubergine.
sentences.chinese: 他還推出了較爲少見的顏色，比如墨綠色和紫紅色。

sentences.english: A mandala made from a photograph of yellow and magenta chrysanthemum.
sentences.chinese: 由黃色與紫紅色的菊花做成的曼荼羅的圖片。

sentences.english: LVS N. 18 Bordeaux Rouge: This strong and full bodied-wine has a deep garnet red color.
sentences.chinese: 這款強勁有力酒體飽滿的葡萄酒呈現深紫紅色。
單瓣花，白色底鑲上紫紅色斑塊。

sentences.english: The sky appears a red sun, like the blooming roses.
sentences.chinese: 天際出現了一抹紫紅色的朝暉，像綻開的紅玫瑰。

sentences.english: Limpid and garnet-coloured, darkened by purple tints.
sentences.chinese: 色澤是清澈的，暗紫紅色。

sentences.english: Aubergine is an interesting alternative to boring black.
sentences.chinese: 紫紅色是代替沉悶黑色的最佳選擇。

sentences.english: Cytoplast and nucleolus were blue with a little purplish red color.
sentences.chinese: 胞漿和核仁呈藍色略帶紫紅色。

sentences.english: In the one photo in which she appeared, Hillary Clinton wore a magenta gown.
sentences.chinese: 在其中一張照片中，希拉里身着一件紫紅色禮服。

sentences.english: The basal part of the renascent seedling is mauve.
sentences.chinese: 新生的光梗蒺藜草幼苗其基部葉鞘呈紫紅色。
